definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.TNT</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.TNT</field></block></value><next><block type="explode"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">16</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">No tienes suficiente TNT!</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
